Topic.Title: What did you say when coldone told you to buy at $11, $12, $13 and $14, hotmodel?

Message.Msg: Just last year coldone told you to buy at $18, his followers bought and then it fell to the 17s and coldone told you to buy at $17, his followers bought and then it fell to the 16s and coldone told you to buy at $16, his followers bought and then it fell to the 15s and coldone told you to buy at $15, his followers bought and then it fell to the 14s and coldone told you to buy at $14, his followers bought and then it fell to the 13s and coldone told you to buy at $13, his followers bought and then it fell to the 12s and coldone told you to buy at $12, his followers bought and then it fell to the 11s and coldone told you to buy at $11 and for the first and last time since $28 coldone was right! But after heavy buying at $28, $26. $24, $22, $20, $19, $18 and every time he called bottom all he and his followers could do were phantom buys begging everyone to buy and ease their huge crushing losses. 4+ years waiting for his all in at $28 and backing up the truck at $26 buys to make him and his followers rich. It has been a pleasure spending his and his followers’ money. And we all look forward to years of the same.

Message.Title: Marissa Mayer Has a Secret Weapon | Wired Business
Message.Msg: Great article by Harald on fusionsearcher: ....In short, Marissa Mayer has developed a deep connection to over three hundred of most talented tech people in Silicon Valley. They may still be at Google, they may have moved to companies like Facebook or Dropbox, or they may have started their own budding enterprises like Optimizely. But in some sense they are all Marissa’s acolytes. It would be not be surprising if some of these baccalaureate APMs wind up at Yahoo. In addition, former APMs all have their own networks, and can tip off Mayer to promising hires. Naturally, one of the first e-mails that Mayer sent after accepting her new job was a blast to the entire APM network, informing them of her move and assuring them that she will still be in touch. She reminded them that they are all part of a very special family. And Mayer would presumably be happy to welcome some of these family members to her new home at Yahoo.

Message.Title: 22% of the deficit due to bush tax cuts..... so pubs, before your next debt ceiling tantrum
Message.Msg: The Congressional Budget Office has calculated that........expiration of the Bush tax cuts....would reduce the deficit by $221 billion. ...... the components of the fiscal cliff from smallest to largest. As you can see, the expiring Bush-era tax cuts are by far the biggest component, totaling $221 billion. By comparison, the sequester would save $65 billion.

Topic.Title: 22% of the deficit due to bush tax cuts..... so pubs, before your next debt ceiling tantrum

Message.Msg: And both together doesnt cover half the deficit. Do we really think anything will change?

Topic.Title: Yahoo to Layoff 1500 Employees

Message.Msg: It's pretty obvious to anyone paying close attention to Yahoo that one big part of Mayer's turnaround is going to have to be layoffs. Massive layoffs. Marc Andreessen says Yahoo needs to fire 10,000 of its 18,000 full-time and part-time employees. I've heard the same figure from a source inside Yahoo. Mayer didn't bring up layoffs at her all-hands meeting with Yahoo employees to announce her turnaround plan for the company, but I was told by a source familiar with her thinking that the only reason for this was that the day was supposed to be a positive day. Layoffs remain a likely move for her. She recently hired a CFO, Ken Goldman, who is a noted cost-cutter.

Message.Title: W increased gov spending 2 times as much as Obama has
Message.Msg: W's 1st budget ...$1.9 trillion W's last budget....$3.2 trillion obama's 1st....$3.2 trillion ...............2012..$3.6 trillion kinda obvious who did the bigger increase of spending, isn't it? the increase in federal spending under Obama is dwarfed by the colossal increase under President Bush. federal government spending under President Bush increased 2X as much as it has under President Obama.

Message.Title: Obama still doesn't get it!!
Message.Msg: Higher tax rates results in lower tax revenue! Higher tax rates results in a higher deficit! Higher tax rates results in a higher national debt We don't have a tax rate problem, we have a spending problem. Why elect a president that got all Ds and Fs in school?
